text: The Paris Descartes University was a French university created on January 1, 1971. It disappeared on January 1, 2020 in favor of Université Paris Cité following the publication in the Official Journal of the decree creating the new university on March 20, 2019.Décret n° 2019-209 du 20 mars 2019 portant création de l'université Paris Cité et approbation de ses statuts == Famous former students == * Ahmed Boukouss * Richard Ferrand * Paul Kaba Thieba ==References== ==Other websites== * Université Paris Cité, official web site Category:1971 establishments in France Category:Universities in Paris
title: Paris Descartes University
